text: I asked for the new beta docs for this particular one but haven't received them yet
The old version did count but I don't think the new beta counts them

Hello, I'm new here :wave: I develop apps for various platforms. I'm looking to build something for the HubSpot App Marketplace. Where is a good place to get ideas for problems that HubSpot users want solved? I also have an idea for an integration that allows non-technical users to convert uploaded MS Word documents into HubSpot landing pages. How would I get validation for such an idea? Thank you :pray:
